properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:51PM CST until January 11 at 7:45AM CST by NWS St Louis MO
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a

* Flood Warning for Small Streams in...
Marion County in south central Illinois...
Fayette County in south central Illinois...

* Until 745 AM CST Saturday.

* At 1050 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain which will cause flooding. Up to two inches of rain
have already fallen and more rainfall is expected to move into the
area over the next two to three hours.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Centralia, Salem, Vandalia, St. Elmo, Sandoval, Wamac, Central
City, Odin, Ramsey, Kinmundy, Brownstown, Patoka, Farina, Omega,
Stephen Forbes Station, Shobonier, Fairman, Wrights Corner, Helm
and Avena.

Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to locally 3 inches are possible in
the warned area.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 61 and 76.
Interstate 57 in Illinois between exits 109 and 135.

This also includes Ramsey Lake State Park.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
